name: Máté Kovács
title: Cloud Engineer
bio: AWS-certified Cloud/DevOps Engineer with 4+ years of experience specializing in designing and optimizing scalable, secure, and cost-effective AWS infrastructure. Recognized as a Well-Architected Lead, with proven expertise in implementing DevOps best practices and integrating machine learning, artificial intelligence, and generative AI solutions to drive innovation and efficiency. Skilled at aligning cloud architectures with business objectives. Passionate about solving complex challenges in cloud engineering and delivering tailored, high-performance solutions.
session_titles: How Athene AI Learned to Read Jira Tickets - MCP Integration in a Bank's Support Team
